message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $950000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking for a more reasonable price. Would you consider selling it for $850000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I am willing to negotiate further. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose we settle on a price of $900000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still seeking a more affordable price. Could you consider selling the product for $875000?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After considering your offer, I am prepared to offer the product at $890000. This price reflects the value of the product while also accommodating your budget constraints.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could you consider selling the product for $880000?
Considering your latest offer, I am willing to sell the product for $885000. This price ensures that both parties are satisfied with the transaction.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. Could you consider selling the product for $875000?

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Bob. Based on your last offer, I am willing to sell the product for $880000. This price respects the value of the product while remaining within your budget.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Could you consider selling the product for $870000?
